H0.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Fauvism

H1.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Expressionism

H2.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Cubism

H3.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Impressionism

A4.text: Matisse is commonly regarded, along with Pablo Picasso, as one of the artists who best helped to define the revolutionary developments in the visual arts throughout the opening decades of the twentieth century, responsible for significant developments in painting and sculpture.

A5.text: The intense colourism of the works he painted between 1900 and 1905 brought him notoriety as one of the Fauves (French for 'wild beasts').
